website_summaries.verdict: A top choice for an antifungal bar soap that provides good lather and results.
pros: Users say this soap is very effective on athlete's foot and other fungal infections
It also stands out for its pleasant scent
cons: May not work for all types of skin conditions or infections

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: So, I bought this soap after a lot of research on how to get rid of ringworm.... After using this soap, it has spread and worsened... and it smells horrible. The first time I used it, I used it all over my body(not rubbing it on my body but onto my hands and then thoroughly washing my hands after each body part(especially careful to wash the area of the ringworm LAST)), and it ended up causing really bad pimples to pop up on my chest and shoulder. This is the most expensive stinky soap I've ever bought. And it most definitely hasnt helped the ringworm:(
customer_reviews.author: KayDN

customer_reviews.title: The Miracle Soap
customer_reviews.text: What a find. I am 83 years old and have had several different colored spots on my forearms. After using the Defense soap only twice the spots disappeared. It also relieved dry skin on my scalp. Great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Great for those afflicted with skin breakout problems
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful soap! Especially great for those afflicted with skin breakout problems (regular acne, oil acne from coming in contact with industrial machines, folliculitis and bacterial skin infections). Saw improvement and healing within a few uses! Make sure to let the soap lather sit on your skin for a few minutes before washing off. Great lather, smells like eucalyptus, skin feels refreshed after using. Caution when using after shaving, will burn a little since pores have been opened. Only complaint is how costly it can be for a bar of soap, but to us it is very worth it. Love this stuff, ordering more today.
customer_reviews.author: terrachic

customer_reviews.title: Did not work (for me)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help with getting rid of a ringworm. After researching and watching several YouTube videos, I did not hesitate to purchase this soap. I’m so sorry I did. My ringworm worsened and started to spread all over my body. I do not have sensitive skin, so I was very surprised and upset about this. After noticing how bad it had gotten I immediately stopped using it and started using tea tree body soap from the body shop. I’m not sure if it is because I stopped using this soap or I started using the tea tree soap, but my ringworm stopped spreading and started to clear up a little. I wouldnt recommend Defense Soap to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Thompson

customer_reviews.title: I wish I would have know about this sooner
customer_reviews.text: I have had diagnosed Tinea Versicolor for 30 years. 8 years ago it went from mostly annoying and unsightly to a painful, burning itching rash on my forearms. After a round of dangerous Oral medication I had relief for a short time, but every summer it comes back with a vengeance. After one week of daily use I could see an improvement, after three weeks my arms were almost cleared and five weeks in I show no sign of it. It is worth a try!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Panici

customer_reviews.title: People had claimed to use this product to help with ...
customer_reviews.text: People had claimed to use this product to help with ring worm, well my son got ring worm and it didn't seem to help at all. Asked his doctor about this soap and she says it does nothing to help. plus it dried out our skin so I can't really use it just to wash up. Just had to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can't honestly say it's helping my skin issue.
customer_reviews.text: I have the fungal infection known as tinea versicolor. I've been using this soap for almost a week and I have to say I'm not seeing any difference at all in the appearance of my skin. I'll keep using this soap until it's used up because it does smell good and it lathers like crazy but I won't hold my breath on if it will fix my fungal issues. UPDATE: After 2 weeks still no change in my Tinea Versicolor.
customer_reviews.author: justanothergoof

customer_reviews.title: GOOD SOAP, NO PEPPERMINT
customer_reviews.text: This is a high-quality soap the only problem is the shape makes it very slippery I prefer dr. Bonner square shape also the smell of peppermint is almost non-existent I like the cooling effect of peppermint in the soap in Phoenix Summers I didn't feel any cooling sensation you could have told me this wasn't peppermint soap and I would have believed it but it is a good quality regular soap
customer_reviews.author: Richard Z. Mazurek

customer_reviews.title: IT MADE MY FACE WORSE!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only been using this for a couple of weeks but from why I’ve seen this sucks! I truly believed it made my ringworm on my face even worse! I was using natural home remedies and an antifungal which was helping it nicely. I thought this would help it completely heal. Indtead it did the opposite, it spreaded it all under my eye. Now I’m stuck with a bigger mess.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Dean

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Soap!
customer_reviews.text: Heard about this soap on a Joe Rogan podcast and it sounded good. Do not worry about the medicinal scent when you get it!! This will not stick to you when you use it!! Clean pure and natural soap, feels good and refreshing and like I said, not overpowering after you shower. I am highly allergic to many soaps, they make me sneeze or itch. This soap does not!! I have been using Dial White soap for over 10 years now and going to drop it like a bad habit, this Defense soap is my go-to soap. I bought the original scent, gonna try oatmeal and peppermint next time! Thank you for making such a natural soap!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great post-workout soap.
customer_reviews.text: This soap is refreshing and works well to get the sweat off after a vigorous workout... or standing outside in the Texas heat for 10.5 seconds. It has also helped tame breakouts on my back/shoulder. Smells great too.
customer_reviews.author: K. Grey

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great
customer_reviews.text: love this stuff!! started to work immediately calmed the itching and burning right away. Rash and redness started to disappear in a of couple days. The smell is not super strong, the wife said she could tell I had put it on but was not offensive. The soap has the eucalyptus smell but not over powering, it lathered well just remember to not rinse off right away. I shave in the shower so i did my face before rinsing. HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS STUFF
customer_reviews.author: Garry B. Huff

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: The boys love this soap. They are both wrestlers and they absolutely stink every evening after practice. This soap smells so good and knowing that it fights fungus and other stuff makes me a happy mom. The entire house smells so good after they take their showers. The soap isn't harsh either. My youngest son has very sensitive skin and can't even use dial soap without breaking out but this soap has not affected him in this way. I love it and will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: KAP-C

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This worked really well for redness in my privates. Have no idea what caused it, but this product cleared it up fast.Be aware when you open the package it is strongly medicinal. However, that dissipates in a couple of days. Personally, I like the smell, it is somewhat medicinal but that’s what you are seeking. Will continue to use because I enjoy the scent and even more, it does the job. Doesn’t stay on my body after drying off.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Neuhart

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I use this bar for my facial acne. My face is looking great and I’ve only had it for a week now. I use Defense in the morning and Cetaphil at now. I lather it with a baby rag and slather it on my face and neck and leave it on for about 30-45 seconds. My face is smoother and it just FEELS clean I’ve struggled with cystic acne for some years now and this is the first product that actually gives you results in such little time as it says it does.
customer_reviews.author: A'Myah R.

customer_reviews.title: Does everything it promises!
customer_reviews.text: I think I am a life time user. I have psoriasis and some scabs can get infected. The soap helps keep everything at bay and helped with a fungal infection I had on my leg. Try this too: I also use it on my face to remove makeup buildup but also help with the zits I get around my cheek area and chin. Has made my face clear and brighter. I recommend to use this soap with a loofah or exfoliator glove(what I use).
customer_reviews.author: Lidia

customer_reviews.title: Gets you clean without harmful chemicals.
customer_reviews.text: I had been using Dial Anti-bacterial bar soap in the shower. It dried out my skin so much but I felt I wanted to make sure I was getting very clean. I got a fungal infection on my skin. The infection required medication but I also wanted to start using an anti-fungal soap. Defense soap makes me feel very clean, it doesn't dry out my skin but actually makes it feel more moisturized and healthy. I also noticed that when I stopped using the dial I didn't feel this toxic feeling on my skin and body. I felt like I was healthier when I started using Defense.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Martin

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: After almost two years of oxiconazole, lotrimin,exonazole, ketoconazole I am finally feeling the relief of jock itch. I highly recommend to anyone with this affliction. It has been 2 weeks since I purchased this product and healing salve. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: John seaton

customer_reviews.title: Extreme Scent
customer_reviews.text: I could smell this soap before I even opened my mailbox, peppermint and tea tree. This was evidence enough to me of its impressive oil content. In the shower, the soap smells fantastic and lathers up well. Not very sudsy but that's okay. It does not burn my skin as some other reviews have said, but I am used to peppermint and tea tree soaps. I had high hopes that this soap would help with my chronic chest, and it has decreased the redness and itching but I still have bumps. Even though the price is a bit high, I will buy the soap again. I am pleased overall.
customer_reviews.author: Bradford R.

customer_reviews.title: If your going to spend your money on antifungal treatments buy this first.
customer_reviews.text: It works fast!!! I had a stubborn ring worm and I mean stubborn. It would not go away no matter what I did and I had it for over a year. It recently flared up now that the warm weather is back and I’ve been sweating. I tried everything from blue star ointment (btw never ever ever use that stuff unless you like unnecessary pain) to antifungal pet wash. Nothing worked, but this did! Using this soap and the secura extra thick miconazole nitrate cream has truly been a blessing. My only gripe is the price. 1bar last 1 week. Maybe more if you use a wash cloth that you change/wash frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Chantel

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't really worked as hoped for me. Using daily for a bad fungal infection, a new spot appeared today. To be fair, no creams or powders have been able to stop this fungus either. It does dry your skin rather badly when left on for a while and used frequently. I do feel a bit less itching immediately after using this soap but it hasn't topped the increased severity of the fungus.
customer_reviews.author: D Man

customer_reviews.title: makes my shower VERY slippery
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap for the odor killing portion of it, seems to be the only soap that ACTUALLY works and keeps working. I will say that no matter what shower i use it in, and i travel with this soap, it makes the shower EXTREMELY slippery. The Peppermint one I try not to use as often when I am shaving because it stings/burns my skin from the mint in the open pores. By far my favorite soap for odor control though, it's a must have in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great bar of soap
customer_reviews.text: I love the Defense bar soap. It is a little more $ than a regular bar of soap but really leaves skin clean and helps with random skin issues. Only complaint I have is, when you get to about 1/2 way thru the bar, it is less potent. For example when I use on my face I feel it tingle, but about 1/2 way thru the bar it no longer tingles, it is not that my skin is just getting used to it, because if I open another bar it will make my skin tingle. Just wish it was same potency for the entire bar especially considering the price. But I do keep buying!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction to tea tree in soap.
customer_reviews.text: I have to give this soap a neutral review for now as my husband is apparently allergic to tea tree oil. I believe this soap will help most people. My young Living tea tree essential oil broke my husband out first. We were not sure it was the oil. Two days later the soap came in and again my husband used tea tree oil. This time he broke out in type A dermatitis (hives) all over his body. This is not a common issue and should not affect most people. I will update my review when we have a reason to use this soap on someone other than my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Best skin protection
customer_reviews.text: Nice clean scent. Soap leaves your skin fresh, clean and sanitzed. I am using it every day to prevent bacterial skin infections, yeast, and breakouts. I am prone to rashes, lesions, boils, and eczema. I am hoping this product will prevent any more flareups. Also using the Defense body wash.
customer_reviews.author: I got lucky

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared for a harsh product
customer_reviews.text: This soap is extremely harsh. I got it for a persistent patch of itching skin that I thought may be fungal in nature. Not only did it not help it irritated the area and made it worse. It has a very strong smell somewhat like insecticide. I have to say that the fault is likely mine for getting a product for an unspecified condition. I imagine if there really was a fungal condition it might be just the ticket. Also the instructions say that it is most effective if used within 4 days of fungal exposure. So if the condition has persisted for very long this would not be a helpful product.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Allen

customer_reviews.title: Probably works well.
customer_reviews.text: I'd recommend this if you spend a lot of time near public showers, pools, locker rooms, or even dressing rooms. I can't say for myself that it works all that well. It likely needs daily application, which I don't do, and I don't come in contact enough with potential hazards to say it helps. But by my best guess, it is more of a preventative measure, rather than a protective measure. Which is just to say that if nothing happens, it's probably working. It does have a great smell, and easy going on sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: Ceara Struck

customer_reviews.title: Expensive. But worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a ring worm breakout. Being in the gym all day everyday exposes me to a lot of people and their nastiness. Even though I spray down the equipment you can't prevent everything. So I have been using this and I think it has been helping. I love the smell. Tea tree is an amazing essential oil and has many benefits. It lathers real nice and doesn't dry out my skin.
customer_reviews.author: V. Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Best ringworm treatment/removal EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so my daughter got ringworm from some kittens while visiting grandma on her face.. Called her Dr and she sent something to the pharmacy.. we also bought some over the counter treatments .. we tried EVERYTHING(!!) to get it to go away (school was starting in a week and nothing was working) so I did some searching online and found a video talking about this soap and how awesome it was.. I ordered it overnight and it got here on Friday ( school started that following Tuesday!!).. anyway, we used it on her twice a day starting on Friday and by Monday it was almost gone!!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Seems fine, pretty overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: The soap seems to work fine so far. I can go through a day and my under arms won't smell, even without deodorant. There's no smell of any particular ingredients in the soap itself. It lathers and cleans like any other soap, just with no fragrance. I keep mine on a shower caddy that hangs from the shower curtain rod so I don't have a problem with the soap getting wet and melting/falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: G.

customer_reviews.title: This has helped to treat my ringworm. It is ...
customer_reviews.text: This has helped to treat my ringworm. It is fading faster than before. It does, however, really dry out my skin and increase the itch. I have to apply lotion ASAP after drying off from the shower. If it didn’t increase the itch I’d give it 5 stars. But if you’re cognizant of that you will really appreciate how well it works to speed up healing.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay M. Layendecker

customer_reviews.title: Okay soap, but not for treatment
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice soap, however, I bought it based off of the reviews from others saying it helped heal or prevent ringworm. I work for a school district where I caught ringworm from a student. Unfortunately, for me it didn’t help heal it. It also has spread to other areas and I also had my daughter using it so she wouldn’t catch the ringworm and she now has a spot on her back. Im still using the soap as it seems like a nice natural daily soap to use and customer service is really good if you have any questions, however definitely didn’t work to help prevent or treat ringworm.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Prevented Pilaris Keratosis
customer_reviews.text: For the first time in the summer months I didn’t get a single bump on my arms from Pilaris keratosis. I also don’t use deodorant because every deodorant I try I get an awful rash. This soap was my last hope and it did everything it said it would do. I use it every day morning and evening showers and my skin feels great. Smooth like a baby’s butt. It smells great and does not dry your skin.
customer_reviews.author: oath101

customer_reviews.title: This soap is effective. As a healthcare professional, ...
customer_reviews.text: This soap is effective. As a healthcare professional, I have to be careful of what I clean myself with as resistant organisms develop over time. The essential oils are effective at reducing the bacteria and fungi on my skin. The most important thing to remember about using any antiseptic is that you have to be thorough when cleaning with them so that the chance of resistance is decreased.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Matney

customer_reviews.title: A PERFECT SKIN SOLUTION PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I wish I found this product years ago. Just after using it for 2 days I’ve noticed a big difference in my skin. I would get acne breakouts on my inner thighs and the rest of my skin on stomach and back would have small itchy bumps (Grover’s disease). Now just after 2 days, my skin is much clearer. I love this stuff and have just ordered the gallon liquid size. If anyone has has trouble with other products not working, I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ed K

customer_reviews.title: VERY STRONG. Use sparingly
customer_reviews.text: Leaves skin dry w an unpleasant antiseptic smell. Think carefully BEFORE using on sensitive skin or delicate portions of your anatomy. Tea tree oil and eucalyptus are ostensibly anti fungal, so use on feet might be reasonable, but, it leaves scalp and all other areas extremely dry. Excellent lather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Great Soap
customer_reviews.text: I have used this soap for 2 weeks for dermatitis on my face as Tea Tree Oil is a good treatment. The soap has no smell that I can sense which is great. I have sensitive skin and the soap cause no reaction. While my skin has cleared using the soap I am also using an ointment so either or both could be working. My dermatitis could be fungal so that is why I wanted to try this soap. So I will continue to use this soap to wash my face.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: New favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Had some athletes foot and jock itch suddenly (thanks to diet changes during pandemic) and had heard wonders about this stuff. Took about 5 days to wipe out all the rashes I had. Was not expecting to enjoy the smell so much, but I LOVE it! Also wasn't expecting it to be so moisturizing! I was a huge fan of Pine Tar soap, but this will now have a permanent spot in my shower.
customer_reviews.author: Willfargo

customer_reviews.title: Hmm...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't seen any difference after two bars, I get better results with apple cider vinegar in a spray bottle: spray affected area with vinegar upon getting in shower, let it sit, dont let water touch area and wash the area with soap and rinse at end of shower
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: I Love It! So gentle!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried the best seller Tea tree oil foot and body wash and a WalMart tea tree oil body wash . I have also used straight tea tree oil. I found Defense Soap, Oatmeal worked the best. It is a gentle soap. I can use it even in the most sensitive areas of my body. My skin is so soft after using it. It also stopped irritations that were extremely painful on my sides, under my bra area and back of my knees. I can feel it removing the oil build up on my face as I smooth it around my nose. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Strong but clean scent.  Great cleansing bar!
customer_reviews.text: When first opening the package, the "medicinal" scent was very strong, but I didn't notice it much once opened and during use. The exfoliating feature with the oatmeal is very nice! This bar does a great job of getting you feeling and smelling clean without your skin feeling tight or dry. This bar prevents strong BO due to bacteria left on the skin as it cleans and rinses really well. I highly recommend this cleansing bar.
customer_reviews.author: chiquitita230

customer_reviews.title: Cleanse and lather without drying skin or getting allergies
customer_reviews.text: My whole family prefers this soap to any other. I started getting it for myself because I have very sensitive skin, and allergies to all synthetic fragrance and many common ingredients in soaps & lotions. For a while I was making my own soap & lotion; but it is labor & cost intensive. So I was glad to find a soap I could rely on. Everyone in the family prefers it.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: This soap is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This soap is amazing! I bought it for my son because of his dermatitis, which makes it easier for him to get ringworms. I told him to use it everyday when he got home from school by the third/ fourth day it was GONE COMPLETELY! I wad so surprised nothing ever worked that quick! In the past he had been prescribed medication or creams that take forever to work & would come off while sleeping. This soap he would wash himself let it sit for 10sec. Then wash it off once a day and just like that it got rid of his ringworms...
customer_reviews.author: J.Sweetlife

customer_reviews.title: We rely on Defense soap and Defense Wipes to keep our relationship happy.
customer_reviews.text: From short camping trips to a 3 week / 8000 mile overlanding adventure, sometimes things can get a bit "funky" in the vehicle or in the tent. Nothing can strain a relationship quite like 10 hours in a car full of BO. A few years ago we found out about the Defense Wipes, gave them a try and we are absolutely thrilled. The Defense Soap bars work just as well at keeping us clean, healthy, and happy. They smell nice, no chemical smells or alcohol burn. Defense products have been with us on just over 100,000 miles of road-trips and remote camping locations, and looking forward to the next 100,000.
customer_reviews.author: Picky Buyer

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: It's different but in a good way. It almost smells "minty" because of the eucalyptus but I like those kinds of smells. At first I was worried it would dry out my skin because of how it feels after rinsing, but I realize now its more of a clean feeling I'm not use to since it doesn't leave soap residue like other products. It does not dry out my skin at all. I don't put on lotion anymore or less than I did before. It's nice having an all natural option that I actually like and I don't have to change my daily routine for it.
customer_reviews.author: K P

customer_reviews.title: Absolute necessity if you frequent a gym/dojo
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after getting staph infection at the base gym. I think Joe Rogan mentioned it on a podcast... honestly I love this soap! It lathers up well, it’s not overkill on the smell, and it leaves my skin feeling clean and protected. I make a point to have a bar with me when I go to the gym now to get the grim of the day off as soon as possible to stave off getting staph again. So far, no staph.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use along side the body wipes. Talk about a one-two punch of effective help when you live in a high temperature area! After 48 hours of use you can truly tell the difference. This restored my hope in living through next summer.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Heflin

customer_reviews.title: Only thing that has kept ringworm spreading
customer_reviews.text: This soap has really helped me to finally get rid of ringworm after a year of battling with it. I exercise everyday so this helps protect me when I sweat. I also shower twice a day to keep my skin clean but that didn't fully stop spreading until this soap. The one downside is that because it is supposed to kinda coat your skin and fill in your pores it feels soapy only for a minute then feels kinda weird. I don't wanna say sticky, but similar. After dried off though, it isn't noticeable. It also makes my face break out, so I would recommend using a facewash instead.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: destroys athletes foot, ringworm, jock itch and all sorts of other skin ailments. I originally got this stuff after struggling with athletes foot for years, and it's the only thing that killed it for my (after trying every over the counter med). I've since always been sure to keep a bar in the house. My little sister caught ringworm from the neighbor's dog, and this stuff destroyed the ringworm super fast. Just remember to keep treating the area (regardless of the condition) for at least two additional weeks after you no longer see symptoms.
customer_reviews.author: This Guy

customer_reviews.title: I personally don't like the scent
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great soap for my skin, all the things people say have held to be true. It really heals your skin, but I don't like the eucalpytus smell on my body. I think that is what bugs me. It smells medicinal - almost like a cleaner. I haven't tried other scents to see if I do better, but it is really good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: L. Short

customer_reviews.title: BYE BYE RINGWORM!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, the only product that cleared my RINGWORM after the first day of use, i cant believe it!!! i was suffering from Ringworm for a month now, i regularly go to the gym and sweating makes it worst. i bought tea tree oil from bed bath and beyond but that didnt work. I ordered purely northwest anti fungal wash and it only stop the itch but the ringworm was still there and growing. This is the only product that dried it up on the first day of use. On the second day, it was almost gone, and i dont see any new ones anymore!! i love it! i will keep buying this!!
customer_reviews.author: KMS

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding soap
customer_reviews.text: I have kidney issues which has meant rashes and skin irritations these past couple years, but this beautiful tea tree oil soap; which I bought because every other bar soap was out of stock - is my new favorite. I will never go back to the other bar soaps. A winner on every level. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Starsha

customer_reviews.title: Seriously recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a soap that could helpe out because my skin is sensitive and I work with chemicals and sweat a lot. I searched up soaps on stores and none work and I was for the heck of it let me search on Amazon and came across this soap, decided to give it a shot and man it does work. I do recommend it and hope the company keeps doing a great job, gob bless their hands. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Great value, long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this soap because I have previously purchased Defend Body Wipes Really liked those but they were not available. The soap is a better value & works great but lacks the convenience up on the go wipes. Really great for that shower after hot sweaty yard work!
customer_reviews.author: Karen A.

customer_reviews.title: Smells like gasoline... but it really does work
customer_reviews.text: This works if you have fungus from acrylics use this to wash your hands everyday also I would suggest a Cotton ball soaked in camphor to clean your nails every morning. In about 8 weeks your fungus should be clear. No doctors needed unless you have a severe case with black nails... then you should seek medical attention.
customer_reviews.author: MISSISSIPPI QUEEN

customer_reviews.title: The best product in Amazon.... I’ve ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable clean feel. If you want to for the time in your life clean and use it. This is the best thing for the largest organ in your body - your skin. Highly recommended, but don’t worry if you don’t it, more for me. I’m subscribed. Thank you for making this great product. JorgeP
customer_reviews.author: JP57

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it's worth the hype
customer_reviews.text: It's too early to tell if this soap will help my dermatitis since I've only used it a few times. However it appears to be making things worse in some places especially my face and neck. Seems to be quite harsh and drying especially for sensitive skin. I'll most likely be returning and purchasing a different soap.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Athlete tested...Father approved!
customer_reviews.text: As a parent of a soccer player, my daughter is always getting dirty, sweaty, etc... I purchased this product hoping to prevent any symptoms of athletes foot or anything else. She enjoys the refreshing scent and no complaints yet. The team's goalkeeper started getting symptons of ringworm on her hand due to the sweaty gloves, due to practicing/playing in rain. I recommended this product also. Symptoms started subsiding and eventually went away. Good product that I would recommend to all athletes.
customer_reviews.author: kennb

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me. I had ringworm all over my back and used this for s while. Did nothing for me. I ended up buying lamisil.
customer_reviews.author: Antman

customer_reviews.title: It a good buy .
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because I am troubled with jock itch and powder spray really irritates my condition. The salve on the market is pretty expensive (for me anyway). I have found this to work really well for me. I have just sent my second order in and will continue to order this soap. It is really effective and I am happy with it. Would recommend it to anyone with a jock itch problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sailor Dan

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely works on tinea versicolor
customer_reviews.text: I am eternally grateful to this soap. I had been battling tinea versicolor for YEARS with topical medication and nothing ever seemed to work until I randomly came across this soap while looking for soap for sensitive skin. Within two months of use and a little sun exposure, the discoloration was disappearing. Now, almost a year later, they’re gone. I’m not even sure if I need to keep using the soap, but it’s cheap and smells good so I will. If you are looking for treatment for tinea versicolor, please use as instructed (lather and leave on skin for a few minutes) and be patient. It is 100% worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Super Relief
customer_reviews.text: Super product, lathers up very well. Read about this product on a psoriasis forum and decided to try. Makes a huge difference on my skin. Such a slick clean feeling and leaves no lingering odor. So glad I found this product. It's a homerun for me.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great body soap.
customer_reviews.text: I use to use the Oatmeal body cream every time I took a shower. Now I use the soap that has Oatmeal in it. The Defense soap works great for I am a diabetic and have dry skin. I was able to cut down alot on the cream thanks to the soap.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Energized shower and clearer skin.
customer_reviews.text: Skin feels good. Feel very energized after showers. I'm allergic to most soaps. This one got rid of dark circles under my chest and look were back in 2 days. I alternate between defense 1day and next day I use dove original with no fragranc.
customer_reviews.author: manny mambo

customer_reviews.title: Best for skin conditions
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this soap for a few years for my kids various skin conditions. One of my son had reoccurring ringworm and within a few days I noticed the area clearing up. My middle child recently had an unknown rash and all treatments prescribed were unsuccessful. Something encouraged me to have him wash the area with this soap and literally in two days this everlasting rash finally began to clear. This is my go to especially for young children.
customer_reviews.author: Ireal Davey

customer_reviews.title: Improves skin
customer_reviews.text: The scent is mild and pleasant and I’m sensitive to scents. I’ve been using it in the shower and my skin feels soft and comfortable. I’ve tried it on my face and it’s fine for that. I bought it to see if it could stop the random red spots I get anywhere on my body. It seems to be healing them and shortening there duration. This is a product I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Christmas junkie

customer_reviews.title: It gave me hives
customer_reviews.text: I hate to discredit the soap since I’ve heard a lot of great things about it... but the first night I applied it after jiu jitsu training, I scrubbed my whole body. By 4am I woke up with a full body itch. By 7am I formed hives ALL OVER MY BODY. Thankfully I didn't scrub my face. Maybe its good for when you actually have a skin infection but Im not risking it till then.
customer_reviews.author: Ulises Martinez

customer_reviews.title: My favorite soap so far!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. My skin is even softer. My girlfriend even compliments me and people say my skin is really clear and nice. Sometimes it is so much I'm scared they may body snatch. I like the smell but some may take a few uses too get used too. It's a natural plant type smell and not a chemical fragrance smell. Repeat customer again for defense products. Couldn't go back too dove soap after this one.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about it, honestly
customer_reviews.text: Not really sure if it helped or not. It didn't effect me, hence the 3 stars, but it made my husband break out, hence the lack of any more stars. It had a strong smell and even though it may be a good alternative natural method for helping rid yourself of bacteria and what not, it just didn't work for me or my husband. On the fence about this product in all honesty.
customer_reviews.author: srutter89Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Normal soap was not cutting it to get through the sweat and grime of a day on a farm. I have very sensitive skin and have no trouble with it and it does not leave your skin dry or flaky. No extra moisturizer needed. Can definitely tell a difference that it kills the bacteria in our sweat the other soaps were missing. When we bought this for the first time I also bought Dial anti bacterial and tried the Defense first and then after that was all used- switched to the Dial soap (using the entire bar so over several weeks of using each exclusively to compare) and Defense was the winner hands down. 10/10 recommended
customer_reviews.author: Mychrichter M.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter this season, and a bar lasted her the entire season (i had an extra bar in case). We use this after practice or meets, and she also uses the defense foam before she ever gets on a mat. There is an outbreak of ringworm every season, but since she started using this combo, we've had zero issues. We won't be without it!
customer_reviews.author: PDX Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Healthy & soothing soap for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: This is the gentlest soap I have ever used! I have very sensitive skin! The Coronavirus requires regular & thorough hand washing which was causing irritation on the back of my hands. This soap actually soothes this condition, like a lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Lindstrom

customer_reviews.title: Great Great Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I had some kind of pseudomonas folliculitis going on from a hot tub and my skin was severely itchy and rashy for a week or more and it wouldn't go away and I kid you not, after the first use I felt immediate relief! I honestly couldn't believe it. It was great! I'm keeping this stuff around for future uses and ordered the liquid soap to use all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Decker

customer_reviews.title: Really lathers nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to help with ringworm from stray kittens. I am using prescription medicine to fight it also, so I cannot say if it is truly helping. I can tell you it is a very nice soap. I am using it in my hair right now, maybe not the best for hair, but is makes a great lather and gets my hair squeaky clean. It lathers very easily on the wash cloth, too. I really like it and the ringworm is finally clearing up,.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Minor help with itching - but learned to really like this soap
customer_reviews.text: Minor help with itching but I really learned to like this soap. It takes very little to suds-up a wash cloth in the shower. The fragrance is nice for a guy in my view and I prefer it to my old soap. It is worth the a try if looking for an alternative to modern day soaps. My dermatologist recommended Dermend Moisturizing Anti Itch Lotion and this has really helped.
customer_reviews.author: Ethics in Review

customer_reviews.title: Defense Soap is not harsh on extremely sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this soap specifically as a topical wash agent for areas that break out in sensitive and itchy rashes as a side event of my chronic autoimmune condition known as Bullous pemphigoid. There is no medical treatment other than Presnidone, a harsh drug. Defense Soap seems to be mild enough, yet does a good job on my sensitive areas; underarms, pelvis, adjacent to the genitals. I have searched for creams and lotions, spending copious funds, but the Defense Soap does help the itching and outbreaks.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Maiman

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for my eczema for 2 months now and so far its helping. My eczema does not flare nearly as much. I don't use it on my face but I use it on the rest of my body. The scent of tea tree oil is strong but I dont mind it. I recommend the daily use of this soap. It's good after sports, martial arts and is also gentle enough on children's skin.
customer_reviews.author: Breliz8

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have diabetes. I am prone fungus issues. I have used this soap for a couple of years on a rotating schedule (3 days) and it helps keep funguses at bay useless I eat too much sugar. I have extremely sensitive skin and nose and the soap does not bother either. Great for athletes feet.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Kelson

customer_reviews.title: Great product - Expensive though
customer_reviews.text: This soap clears dry cracking and fungus on my feet and also seems to help with any irritation I may have on my skin in general. The only unfortunate thing is that it doesn't last long and for the price you have to be willing to spend quite a bit. Other than that I highly recommend this soap. I would buy it more often if I could afford it! Two soap bars lasted me about a week.
customer_reviews.author: carloseats

customer_reviews.title: We like DEFENSE :)
customer_reviews.text: We like for DEFENSE soaps for being natural and it seems they really take care of body odor (especially with teen boys) :) Thanks for this product! :)
customer_reviews.author: J. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Magic soap!
customer_reviews.text: First time and won't be the last. This soap bar is amazing and best I have ever used. It is very strong but somehow also balancing and skin softening. Zapped my very resistant acne, bug bites, and skin infection in under a week of daily usage. I only use this soap and sunscreen now. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Mya

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I like this soap as it does not fall apart or dissolve rapidly like other natural soaps. Defense soap has good lather and scent, rinses off easily, and does not leave you feeling like left over residue on your skin after shower. It quickly worked on both foot fungus and jock itch at our house which is a huge bonus as we do not like the feeling of creams, lotions, or the spray on powders. I found it to somewhat leave skin feeling drier, but to be fair, I would rather have a soap my house will use and works as advertised over somewhat drier skin any day.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Lambdin

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing soap!
customer_reviews.text: I began using this just after Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu training, but quickly started using it every day. It smells great, I feel clean, and the bars last a long time. (UPDATE) I've been using this soap for several years now. I use the regular formula daily and the new medicated bar right after training. Never had a skin issue and am completely happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Charles M tressler

customer_reviews.title: Defense is the best
customer_reviews.text: I've used the original Defense bars for years. Glad I decided to try the Oatmeal version as it's more moisturizing. I'll be buying the 12 pack of Oatmeal once I'm done with the original bars. Yay 🙂.
customer_reviews.author: Mya

customer_reviews.title: Our Summer Soap
customer_reviews.text: I bought this soap for my two boys (6 & 4 yrs) for the summer. They are dirty little people getting into everything outside during the summer. This soap has been helpful at scrubbing off the day and helping itchy bug bitten skin. I purchased the peppermint which is pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Gray

customer_reviews.title: Be careful of allergies
customer_reviews.text: I used the soap twice, and while the ad said it was safe for sensitive skin, I broke out in a rash a few days after using it. It may not cause this with everyone, but I have very sensitive skin and excema.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah E. Michalak

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me.
customer_reviews.text: I am not going to talk to you about my personal issue and thanks to this stuff I don't have the issue anymore. I will say I tried a few things prescribed for me and this has worked better and faster than any of them. Thumbs up. Follow the instructions. I hope it works for you as well as it did for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mr S Le Page

customer_reviews.title: Best soap I've ever used to prevent itchy rash from summer heat and sweating
customer_reviews.text: Big girls, if you have a rash from sweating like I do, this is the best soap to use. It will kill the bacteria/fungus that causes that itchy rash. Follow up after bath/shower by drying thoroughly and using a good powder for those places which tend to break out in the heat.
customer_reviews.author: W. Jessup, My Stuff Runneth Over!

customer_reviews.title: 100% Natural and Herbal Pharmaceutical Grade Antibacterial Tea Tree Oil and Eucalyptus Oil
customer_reviews.text: 100% Natural and Herbal Pharmaceutical Grade Antibacterial Tea Tree Oil and Eucalyptus Oil Helps Wash Away Ringworm, Jock Itch, Dry Skin, Dandruff, Acne, Psoriasis, Yeast, and Athlete’s Foot
customer_reviews.author: Christina Go

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful. Keeps me very clean and smelling great.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful. Keeps me very clean and smelling great. I exclusively use defense because it makes me feel actually clean rather than just rinsed off with some artificial fragrance on top to mask order. I used to have body odor that me really self conscious. Since I started using Defense over a year ago, I feel much more confident knowing that I sleep good and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Allie E.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cleanser to reduce bacteria!
customer_reviews.text: This soap exceeded my expectations! It was initially bought so that I could eliminate use of chemical antibacterial soap that was causing skin irritation. I smell fresh and I’m happy! On an unusual note, this soap stopped urinary urgency that I’ve suffered from for years... I thought it was due to age but more likely was due to bacteria. No more pads... amazing!! It has a light clean scent and rinses completely. I’m so impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Ali C

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This soap is part of my daily shower routine, i had ring worm all over my belly and i got this soap with oregano capsules and miconazole and now im clean! What a great feeling after 5 weeks of using this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Valdez

customer_reviews.title: great soap in bar form
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy the liquid soap, but wanted to travel with it so bought the bars. Happy I did. The bar lasted a few weeks with one shower a day. Smells exactly like the liquid version and works just as well. Now I can travel with Defense soap and am very happy I can. Great after a long plane ride!
customer_reviews.author: RonS

customer_reviews.title: Miracle soap! Hope they make it forever!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! My 13yr old suddenly developed acne on her back and chest. I took her to the dermatologist. They put her on a sulfa cleanser and two topical medications. Those didn’t work after 4 months. I tried this and within a week it was almost all gone! We couldn’t believe it!! I had even tried just tea tree oil but that also did nothing. Whatever this soap is it’s amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great soap!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this soap. I had ringworm and tried prescribed topical cream and pills. Nothing worked, in fact, it spread like wildfire. I ordered this soap and showered twice a day (morning and night) with it. Within two weeks, it started clearing it up and no more popped up. Now I shower with this soap just because. I also let my sister try it on her eczema patch and she says it helped a lot! I swear by this soap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky clean.
customer_reviews.text: Husband wanted to try this after hearing about it on the JRE podcast. He loves it. I have tried it as well and it’s really great. Leaves you feeling clean as can be.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great soap to fight the funk
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bar soap guy. No luffas, no exfoliating b.s., just clean baby. This product fights any type of nasty with organic goodness. Would like a little more scent since I don't funk with cologne, but otherwise great product.
customer_reviews.author: RCadi

customer_reviews.title: reorder because its great
customer_reviews.text: I used this soap on my now deceased husband when he was bed ridden. Helped fight rashes etc. I forgot about it until my scalp developed extreme itching. Found a bar tucked away in a drawer and started using it from head to toe. Itching is not completely gone but so much reduced I don't claw my head. So---I went on line looking for it and replenished my supply.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: didn;t work for me :(
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this soap but after using it for 2 months I have seen no results at all. Interesting enough there is a disclaimer on the box that pretty much says it is not an anti fungal and is not approved to treat or do pretty much anything...
customer_reviews.author: CDR

customer_reviews.title: Cured MY ringworm
customer_reviews.text: This soap was a life saver a couple years ago! I had gotten a bad case of ringworm on my face it was huge and just sore and uncomfortable in many ways. I tried everything Google had offered in advice but nothing worked. I ran across a YouTube video of this defense soap. I ordered it immediately and after 3 THREE days it was gone!!!! I got it again last week and of course ordered another batch of it. It took about a week this time but it still cured it! This has worked for me for ache or any type of skin blemish I've gotten. It's been a miracle bar!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

product_meta.title: Defense Soap 4 Ounce Bar (Pack of 2) - 100% Natural and Herbal Pharmaceutical Grade Tea Tree Oil
feature_bullets: CLINICALLY PROVEN NATURAL TEA TREE OIL AND EUCALYPTUS OIL provide a broad spectrum of benefits effective at helping wash away bacteria and fungus
PROVEN IN THE WORLD OF CONTACT SPORTS TO EFFICIENTLY REMOVE dirt, grime, gym crud, sweat, smog, allergens, grunge, and built up oils
HIGHEST QUALITY WASH WITH SUPERIOR RINSING ACTION restores the skin's natural barrier and helps controls the production of sebum and dead skin cells
HYPOALLERGENIC AND SAFE eucalyptus scent for sensitive skin. Triple milled for quality, consistency and longevity
NATURAL, FREE & CLEAR with no fragrances, dyes, cosmetics, petrochemical compounds, triclosan, alcohol or sodium lauryl sulfate
